availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Merritt Scott. Father of William E. Scott, Francis M. Scott, Thomas J. Scott, and Margaret M. Scott. Blacksmith in Orange County, Indiana, in 1850. Blacksmith in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Orange County, Paoli, p. 459B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, p. 711.
